mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PICKUP(ID, PICKUP_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, PICKUP_SCHEDULE, PICKUP_ENTER, PICKUP_REQUEST_CONTENT, PICKUP_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_PICKUP.NEXTVAL, #{pickupNumber}, #{memberId}, #{pickupSchedule}, #{pickupEnter}, #{pickupRequestContent}, #{pickupStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT P.ID, P.PICKUP_NUMBER, P.MEMBER_ID, P.DRIVER_ID, P.PICKUP_SCHEDULE, P.PICKUP_ENTER, P.PICKUP_REQUEST_CONTENT, P.PICKUP_STATUS, P.CREATED_DATE, P.UPDATED_DATE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_CODE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_BASIC, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, PL.PLAN_PRICE, PL.PLAN_GRADE, PL.PLAN_BOX_SIZE, PL.PLAN_DELIVERY_FEE, PL.PLAN_MAX_MEMBERS FROM TBL_PICKUP P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT PA ON M.ID = PA.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PLAN PL ON PA.PLAN_ID = PL.ID WHERE P.ID = #{id}

SELECT P2.ID, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_CODE, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_BASIC, M.MEMBER_ADDRESS_DETAIL, P2.PICKUP_NUMBER, P2.MEMBER_ID, P2.DRIVER_ID, P2.PICKUP_SCHEDULE, P2.PICKUP_ENTER, P2.PICKUP_REQUEST_CONTENT, P2.PICKUP_STATUS, P2.CREATED_DATE, P2.UPDATED_DATE, PL.PLAN_PRICE, PL.PLAN_GRADE FROM TBL_MEMBER M JOIN ( SELECT ROWNUM R, ID, PICKUP_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, DRIVER_ID, PICKUP_SCHEDULE, PICKUP_ENTER, PICKUP_REQUEST_CONTENT, PICKUP_STATUS, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM ( SELECT ID, PICKUP_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID, DRIVER_ID, PICKUP_SCHEDULE, PICKUP_ENTER, PICKUP_REQUEST_CONTENT, PICKUP_STATUS, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_PICKUP P ORDER BY
P.ID ID
ASC ) P1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} ) P2 ON M.ID = P2.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PAYMENT PA ON M.ID = PA.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PLAN PL ON PA.PLAN_ID = PL.ID AND P2.R >= #{pagination.startRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PICKUP SET PICKUP_SCHEDULE = #{pickupSchedule}, PICKUP_ENTER=#{pickupEnter}, PICKUP_REQUEST_CONTENT=#{pickupRequestContent}, PICKUP_STATUS =#{pickupStatus}, UPDATED_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
